articles.author: Bridget Brown, Pamela Sampson, Curtis Yee
articles.title: Live updates: Trump's Indiana redistricting loss raises questions about his power over the GOP - AP News
articles.description: President Donald Trump said Thai and Cambodian leaders have agreed to renew a ceasefire the U.S. administration had helped broker earlier this year.
articles.content: Indianas Republican-led Senate decisively rejected a redrawn congressional map Thursday that would have favored their party, defying months of pressure from President Donald Trump and delivering a st… [+1046 chars]
